participant_1.name: Claire
participant_1.personality: Curious and sociable, Claire enjoys engaging conversations and is always eager to learn about others.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Caring and driven, Mark is passionate about his work and values family, often sharing joyful moments about his daughter.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.
